content: I don’t know where you experienced all this, but it surely put you in a perspective on a whole different level. Kudos and when I use this word is for I know and understand what means, it requires a lot of courage and strength to touch the bottom and re-emerge to gasp. Your piece can be dubbed into self help category, but they won’t ever know or understand what it means to you and how every word is experienced by you. Praises will come but not yet not yet.
